remarks: Finite product closure lemma.  A version of ~ fprodcllem using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodcllemf.ph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodcllemf.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
fprodcllemf.xy $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
fprodcllemf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodcllemf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. S ) $.
fprodcllemf.1 $e |- ( ph -> 1 e. S ) $.
fprodcllemf $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B e. S ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d S k x y $.
$d ph x y $.
